paper_title: Stability estimates for semigroups in the Banach case
abstract: The purpose of this paper is to revisit previous works of the author with J. Sj√∂strand (2010--2021) proved in the Hilbert case by considering the Banach case at the light of a paper by Y.~Latushkin and V.~Yurov (2013).
publication_venue: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2103.06792
